name: FMRIprepSingleSubject
author: Poldrack lab
command-line: SUB_FULL_PATH=[SUBJECT_DIR]; SUBJECT_NAME=$(basename "$SUB_FULL_PATH"); FAKE_BIDS_DIR=fake_bids_dir; [[ "$SUB_FULL_PATH" != /* ]] && SUB_FULL_PATH="$PWD"/"$SUB_FULL_PATH"; mkdir -p "$FAKE_BIDS_DIR"; ln -s "$SUB_FULL_PATH" "$FAKE_BIDS_DIR"/"$SUBJECT_NAME"; fmriprep "$FAKE_BIDS_DIR" [OUTPUT_DIR] participant --skip_bids_validation --participant_label "$SUBJECT_NAME" [TASK_ID] --nthreads 1 --omp-nthreads 1 --mem_mb 8192 [LOW_MEM] [USE_PLUGIN] [ANAT_ONLY] [BOILERPLATE] [VERBOSE_COUNT] [IGNORE] [LONGITUDINAL] [BOLD2T1W_DOF] [USE_BBR] [MEDIAL_SURFACE_NAN] [USE_AROMA] [AROMA_MELODIC_DIMENSIONALITY] [SKULL_STRIP_TEMPLATE] [SKULL_STRIP_FIXED_SEED] [FMAP_BSPLINE] [FMAP_NO_DEMEAN] [USE_SYN_SDC] [FORCE_SYN] [FS_LICENSE] [HIRES] [CIFTI_OUTPUT] [RUN_RECONALL] [RESOURCE_MONITOR] [REPORTS_ONLY] [RUN_UUID] [WRITE_GRAPH] [STOP_ON_FIRST_CRASH] [NOTRACK] [SLOPPY]; status=$?; test $status -eq 0 && rm -rf [OUTPUT_DIR]/freesurfer/fsaverage; bash -c "exit $status"
description: fMRIprep is a functional magneticresonance image pre-processing pipeline that is designed to provide an easily accessible, state-of-the-art interface that is robust to differences in scan acquisition protocols and that requires minimal user input, while providing easily interpretable and comprehensive error and output reporting (https://fmriprep.readthedocs.io). NOTE: This descriptor is designed to integrate specifically with a CBRAIN installation. It takes as input a single subject according to the BIDs specification

inputs.description: subject folder for BIDS (folders name should be sub-XXXXX).
inputs.name: subject_dir

inputs.description: the output path for the outcomes of preprocessing and visual reports
inputs.name: output_dir_name

inputs.description: The FreeSurfer license key file
inputs.name: fs_license_file

inputs.description: select a specific task to be processed
inputs.name: task_id

inputs.description: attempt to reduce memory usage (will increase disk usage in working directory)
inputs.name: low_mem

inputs.description: nipype plugin configuration file
inputs.name: use_plugin

inputs.description: run anatomical workflows only
inputs.name: anat_only

inputs.description: generate boilerplate only
inputs.name: boilerplate

inputs.description: increases log verbosity for each occurence, debug level is -vvv
inputs.name: verbose_count

inputs.description: ignore selected aspects of the input dataset to disable corresponding parts of the workflow (a space delimited list)
inputs.name: ignore

inputs.description: treat dataset as longitudinal - may increase runtime
inputs.name: longitudinal

inputs.description: Degrees of freedom when registering BOLD to T1w images. 6 degrees (rotation and translation) are used by default.
inputs.name: bold2t1w_dof

inputs.description: Always use boundary-based registration (no goodness-of-fit checks)
inputs.name: use_bbr

inputs.description: Replace medial wall values with NaNs on functional GIFTI files. Only performed for GIFTI files mapped to a freesurfer subject (fsaverage or fsnative).
inputs.name: medial_surface_nan

inputs.description: add ICA_AROMA to your preprocessing stream
inputs.name: use_aroma

inputs.description: Exact or maximum number of MELODIC components to estimate (positive = exact, negative = maximum)
inputs.name: aroma_melodic_dimensionality

inputs.description: select ANTs skull-stripping template (default: OASIS30ANTs))
inputs.name: skull_strip_template

inputs.description: do not use a random seed for skull-stripping - will ensure run-to-run replicability when used with --omp-nthreads 1
inputs.name: skull_strip_fixed_seed

inputs.description: fit a B-Spline field using least-squares (experimental)
inputs.name: fmap_bspline

inputs.description: do not remove median (within mask) from fieldmap
inputs.name: fmap_no_demean

inputs.description: EXPERIMENTAL: Use fieldmap-free distortion correction
inputs.name: use_syn_sdc

inputs.description: EXPERIMENTAL/TEMPORARY: Use SyN correction in addition to fieldmap correction, if available
inputs.name: force_syn

inputs.description: disable sub-millimeter (hires) reconstruction
inputs.name: hires

inputs.description: output BOLD files as CIFTI dtseries
inputs.name: cifti_output

inputs.description: disable FreeSurfer surface preprocessing. Note : `--no-freesurfer` is deprecated and will be removed in 1.2. Use `--fs-no-reconall` instead.
inputs.name: run_reconall

inputs.description: enable Nipype's resource monitoring to keep track of memory and CPU usage
inputs.name: resource_monitor

inputs.description: only generate reports, don't run workflows. This will only rerun report aggregation, not reportlet generation for specific nodes.
inputs.name: reports_only

inputs.description: Specify UUID of previous run, to include error logs in report. No effect without --reports-only.
inputs.name: run_uuid

inputs.description: Write workflow graph.
inputs.name: write_graph

inputs.description: Force stopping on first crash, even if a work directory was specified.
inputs.name: stop_on_first_crash

inputs.description: Opt-out of sending tracking information of this run to the FMRIPREP developers. This information helps to improve FMRIPREP and provides an indicator of real world usage crucial for obtaining funding.
inputs.name: notrack

inputs.description: Use low-quality tools for speed - TESTING ONLY
inputs.name: sloppy

groups.name: Memory and Parallel Control Parameters
groups.description: Paramters used to define memory requirements and multithreading

groups.name: Experimental Parameters
groups.description: Parameters that one should use at their own risk.

output-files.name: Output Directory
output-files.description: This is the directory where the overall outputs are to be stored.
